headline: West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. (WST): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. (WST) on Swiss Transparent Portfolio’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on WST. West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. (WST)’s share was trading at $208.49 as of 22nd May. WST’s trailing and forward P/E were 32.73 and 34.36respectively according to Yahoo Finance. West Pharmaceutical […]
